description:
The IcaJog was a part of DOP. IcaJog4 is a redevelopment of the DOP Version. It has a similar GUI and includes the same and more features. 
 Moving one, many robot locations (incl. whole pathes) and/or robot.by TransferJog (x,y,z,Rx,Ry,Rz,toPrevLoc,toNextLoc) by different bases. by JointJog (moving each robot axis incl. external axes) by Manipulator Delete/Copy location (as ViaLocation) Teach/Unteach locations Undo/Redo
pre_install: Write-Error "Process Simulate is running. Please close it to continue."
pre_uninstall: Write-Error "Process Simulate is running. Please close it to continue."
